qas.question: Who was the winner of American Idols ninth season?
What U2 song was released by Lee DeWyze after winning American Idol?
What song did DeWyze cover for his first release?
Which song did Bowersox cover for her first release?

context: The final two contestants were <a0_0>Lee DeWyze<a0_0/> and Bowersox. DeWyze was declared the winner during the <a2_0>May 26<a2_0/> finale. No new song was used as coronation song this year; instead, the two finalists each released a cover song – DeWyze chose U2's "<a1_0><a3_0>Beautiful Day<a3_0/><a1_0/>", and Bowersox chose Patty Griffin's "<a4_0>Up to the Mountain<a4_0/>". This is the first season where neither finalist achieved significant album sales.
